amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that all completed permit applications include data on executive bonuses distributed by the applicant company in the most recent quarter.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 112-111 to require that all completed applications include data on bonuses provided to the executives of the applicant from the most recent quarter.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 258 (Roll no. 470).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 258 (Roll no. 470).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Keating.
